name: Cookie Monster
description: A simple web challenge about cookies. Set the right cookie value to get the flag!
solutions: Set a cookie named 'Red_Guy's_name' with a value that matches the regex pattern
The pattern requires the value to contain 'E' or 'e' followed by 'lmo' and one or more characters
After setting the correct cookie, refresh the page to see the flag
hints: Check the browser's developer tools to see how cookies are set
You can use JavaScript in the console to set cookies
Remember to include the correct cookie name and value format
